mapper.select: SELECT ug.id,ug.name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT u.real_name) AS user_name,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.name) AS project_name FROM user_group ug LEFT JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON ug.id= ugr.group_id LEFT JOIN user u ON ugr.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN group_project_relation grp ON ug.id = grp.group_id LEFT JOIN project p ON grp.project_id =p.id GROUP BY ug.id
